Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: fabric-test-pte CI job fails as fabric-sdk-node submodule fails to update due to Authentication error.
Issue.description: FETCH_HEAD 19:07:16 19:07:16 *** Please tell me who you are. 19:07:16 make 1 : *** git-latest Error 1 19:07:16 make 1 : Leaving directory '/w/workspace/fabric-test-pte-x86_64/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-test' 19:07:16 Makefile:99: recipe for target 'pull-images' failed 19:07:16 make: *** pull-images Error 2 {code} *Build Logs* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-test-pte-x86_64/49/ https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-test/job/fabric-test-pte-x86_64/49/consoleFull >
